name: SocialBlox
description: SocialBlox is a privacy first social media platform. With the launch of SocialBlox app, users will be able to discover whole new social media features. By using blockchain technology it is now possible to set challenges to other users worldwide without the issue of trust. Conditional transactions will provide the much-needed safety to interact and bring social media to the next level. Our iOS app is already at beta testing stage with SocialBlox community members and will be alpha released in coming months. So, are you ready to accept a challenge, post the content and collect SBLX-tokens?
